title: A verye fruitful exposicion vpon the syxte chapter of Saynte Iohn diuided into. x. homelies or sermons: written in Latin by the ryghte excellente clarke Master Iohn Brencius, [and] tra[n]slated into English by Richard Shirrye, Londoner.
author: Brenz, Johannes, 1499-1570.
publicationDate: The yere of our Lorde God MD.L. 1550 the nynth daye of Apryll]
publisher: By Ihon Daie, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, and Wylliam Seres dwelling in Peter Colledge,
notes: Running title reads: An exposicion vpon the. vi. chapter of Iohn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
